bio.p: Sangeetha Meenakshisundaram is working as Assistant Professor in the Department of Chemistry, Sri Krishna College of Engineering and Technology, Coimbatore, India. She pursued her Master of Science from Avinashilingam Deemed University and Master of Philosophy from Bharathiar University. In 2017, she obtained a PhD from Bharathiar University, Coimbatore, India. Her fields of interest include organic synthesis and medicinal chemistry.
